about.title: About Me
paragraphs: Welcome! I'm Lili Ibrahim, a passionate game artist and illustrator with 5 years of experience creating visual stories that captivate and inspire.
My journey began when I discovered digital art during university. I specialize in character design, environment art, and concept art, with a particular love for bringing imaginary worlds to life.

I've had the privilege of working on several indie game projects and freelance illustration commissions. My work spans from fantasy RPGs to modern puzzle games, always with an eye for storytelling, atmosphere, and rich detail.

When I'm not wielding a digital brush, you can find me exploring new art techniques, playing video games for inspiration, or sketching in local coffee shops. I believe that great art comes from curiosity and constant learning.
